help_dumbbells.title: Dumbbells
help_dumbbells.content:
Dumbbells are used for strength training exercises.

They can be found in the weight lifting area of the gym.

help_weights.title: Weights
help_weights.content:
Weights are used for strength training exercises.

They can be found in the weight lifting area of the gym

help_bike.title: Bike
help_bike.content:
Bikes are used for cardiovascular exercise.

They can be found in the cardio area of the gym.

To start cycling, please ensure the bike is unlocked.

help_towels.title: Towels
help_towels.content:
We provide a free towel service so you can wipe off sweat and water during and after the exercise.

Please place any used towel in the green bin.

Fresh Towels can be found at the towel dispensers next to the shower.

help_shower.title: Shower
help_shower.content:
Our Showers can be used free of charge to rinse off sweat after your workout.

They are located in the changing area.

help_sauna.title: Sauna
help_sauna.content:
Sauna is operated between 10:00 and 19:00, for other times please contact us at:

+49 176 99556677.

Saunas are used to relax muscles and promote sweating.

The sauna can be found next to the changing area.

help_drinks.title: Drinks
help_drinks.content:
A great selection of non-alcoholic drinks can be found at the fridge next to the changing rooms.

Drinks such as water or sports drinks are used to stay hydrated during exercise.

They can be found at the gym's water fountains or vending machines.

help_changing.title: Changing Room
help_changing.content: To change into your workout clothes, feel free to use the changing room located near the entrance of the gym.

help_hairdryer.title: Hair Dryer
help_hairdryer.content: To dry your hair after a shower, a free-of-charge hair dryer is located in the changing room.

help_lockers.title: Lockers
help_lockers.content:
GYMBOXes are designed for exclusive use! Besides you and friends you invite, nobody will use the gym during your session.

To store personal belongings during a workout, you won't need a locker, just place them anywhere in the gym.

It's safe!

help_toiletries.title: Toiletries
help_toiletries.content:
We provide a range of complimentary toiletries such as soap, shampoo, and conditioner to clean your body after the workout.

They are located next to the shower.

help_nutrition.title: Nutrition
help_nutrition.content:
We offer a wide variety of snacks for you to stay nurtured.

A vending machine is located right next to the changing room.

help_treadmill.title: Treadmill
help_treadmill.content:
Treadmills are used for cardiovascular exercise.

They can be found in the cardio area of the gym.

help_ellipctical.title: Elliptical
help_ellipctical.content:
Ellipticals are used for cardiovascular exercise.

They can be found in the cardio area of the gym.

help_yoga.title: Yoga Mat
help_yoga.content:
Yoga mats are used for yoga and stretching exercises.

They can be found in the stretching area of the gym.

help_bands.title: Resistance Bands
help_bands.content:
Resistance bands are used for strength training and stretching exercises.

They can be found in the stretching area of the gym.
